title: Anyone else feel like this patch is a little... broken?
body: Maybe I've just been unlucky, but the new reworked juggernauts are super hard to deal with. I also think Fiora, Kayle and Warwick are a little over tuned right now. Probably the worst patch in terms of balance this season. Does anyone else feel this way?

replies.body:
Just a tad a lot. 
Mordekaiser is so broken right now 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BCkH0_nCFLY
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
not many champs were left behind this patch, those juggernauts can still get roflstomped in champ select.
